movies.title: Historias Breves V: Un juego absurdo
movies.plot: Javier is in love with Romina. At a party, we hear his thoughts and sometimes he even talks to us. Playing between reality and fantasy, Javier will try to overcome his fears and get the girl of his dreams.
movies.simplePlot: Javier is in love with Romina. At a party, we hear his thoughts and sometimes he even talks to us. Playing between reality and fantasy, Javier will try to overcome his fears and get the girl of his dreams.

biography.placeOfBirth: Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Argentina
biography.bio: Martín Piroyansky was born on March 3, 1986 in Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Argentina. He is an actor and writer, known for XXY (2007), Volley (2014) and In the Clouds (2014).
biography.name: Martín Piroyansky

biography.bio: Eliana González was born on May 7, 1983 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. She is an actress, known for Cebollitas (1997), Historias Breves V: Un juego absurdo (2009) and Maradona, the Hand of God (2007).
biography.name: Eliana González

biography.bio: Irene Almus is an actress, known for Young Lovers (2001), Historias Breves V: Un juego absurdo (2009) and El niño pez (2009).
biography.name: Irene Almus

biography.bio: Vando Villamil is an actor, known for God's Slave (2013), Roma (2004) and La señal (2007).
biography.name: Vando Villamil

biography.bio: Nicolás Torcanowsky is an actor, known for 2 + 2 (2012), Historias Breves V: Un juego absurdo (2009) and The Games Maker (2014).
biography.name: Nicolás Torcanowsky

biography.bio: María Fernanda Callejón is an actress, known for Sofabed (2006), Young Lovers (2001) and Historias Breves V: Un juego absurdo (2009).
biography.name: María Fernanda Callejón

biography.bio: Bruno Iacobaccio is an actor, known for Historias Breves V: Un juego absurdo (2009) and Historias Breves 5 (2009).
biography.name: Bruno Iacobaccio

actors.character: El que gusta de la madre del amigo

biography.bio: Laila Horwitz is an actress, known for Historias Breves V: Un juego absurdo (2009) and Historias Breves 5 (2009).
biography.name: Laila Horwitz

biography.bio: Ignacio Gauna is an actor, known for Historias Breves V: Un juego absurdo (2009) and Historias Breves 5 (2009).
biography.name: Ignacio Gauna

biography.bio: Sergio Pangaro is an actor and composer, known for L'artiste (2008), Historias Breves V: Un juego absurdo (2009) and L'homme d'à côté (2009).
biography.name: Sergio Pangaro

categories.category: Best Short Film, Fiction (Mejor Cortometraje de Ficción)

companyCreditsSimple.name: Instituto Nacional de Cine y Artes Audiovisuales (INCAA)
